tool_description: Analyzes historical content performance data to identify patterns, successful content types, optimal posting times, and factors that drive engagement and conversions.

content_data_source.description: Source of content performance data (analytics_platform, csv_file, api_endpoint)

metrics_to_analyze.description: Performance metrics to analyze (views, engagement, shares, conversions, clicks)

minimum_sample_size.description: Minimum number of content pieces for reliable analysis

error_messages: Invalid data source: Ensure content_data_source is accessible and contains required fields.
Invalid date range: Start date must be before end date and within available data range.
Unsupported metrics: Use recognized metrics (views, engagement, shares, conversions, clicks).
Insufficient data: Need at least the minimum_sample_size of content pieces for analysis.
usage: Specify content_data_source, date range, and metrics_to_analyze. Optionally filter by content_categories and set minimum_sample_size. Returns comprehensive performance analysis.

top_performing_content.description: Highest performing content pieces with metrics

optimal_posting_times.description: Best times and days for content posting

engagement_drivers.description: Key factors that drive engagement and performance
